name: mSmart
tag_list: mobile, content, subscription, sms, iphone, members, digital, social-networking
overview:
mSmart Inc. is a digital performance marketing company. We bring together the power of the Internet, the latest in mobile technology, and traditional marketing methodologies, creating a fully integrated and consistently profitable vehicle for both entertainment content and brand-based and performance advertising.

A pioneer in both the performance marketing industry and in mobile content delivery, mSmart Inc. brings an intense focus on achieving the highest ROI yield for its advertising partners via transparent display and search consumer traffic. mSmart Inc. scales its solutions by leveraging vast quantities of data, enormous internet reach and unparalleled industry expertise.

mSmart Inc. also operates an extensive and growing portfolio of ready-to-use interactive products and iTV formats that are marketed on a white label basis to Broadcasters, Media Companies and Brands. Our formats turn audiences into loyal and paying customers, thus adding new revenue streams to our clients.

Headed by a team of Internet, new media, entertainment and technology professionals, mSmart Inc was founded in 2006.

Based in New York City with an office in Washington DC, the company is solely funded by its founder and a few angel investors.
